Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)

= a flowering plant with an erect stem and long narrow leaves; it can grow to 1.5 m high; it has a bulbous root and cone shaped flowers, usually with 5 6 petals, which protrude straight out or slightly downward from the stem; ◄ Lilium candidum; ► associated with unsurpassed beauty
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Izhar (יִצְהָר) descendant of Kohath (קֳהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► opponent of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) ancestor of Korahite (קָרְחִי) clan

= the meaning of this word is uncertain and can only be deduced from its etymology; possible interpretations include: a song that shows understanding, by which the understanding either refers to the structure or to the contents of this song; or: a song that gives understanding; or: a meditation
= strong feelings of affection
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= action by which humans refer to a particular object when speaking
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking

= reed of about 20 centimeters long and sharpened on one end and split to form a nib; sometimes made of a rush cut at an angle and then frayed to form a fine brush; ► used for making marks with ink on writing material

= a high ranking official, usually learned, who served in the king's court and was responsible for the king's official business ► held some authority in administrative and financial, and perhaps also military matters
literally: swift; hence: = state in which humans have a significant level of proficiency in a certain craft, which enables them to work relatively fast
= process by which humans or plants develop into a state that is pleasing to the eye
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

Node.gloss: kind words flow from one's lips
Node.definition: literally: grace is poured out on (one's) lips; hence: = pattern of actions by which humans speak gracious and kind words
= state in which words are uttered with a positive and compassionate attitude

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

Node.gloss: to gird oneself|to put on (clothes, armor)
Node.definition: = action by which someone ties a belt or piece of cloth around the waist; hence also: to put on clothes or armor
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= the upper part of the leg of humans and animals
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= state in which humans, deities, animals and plants are respected by others, implying beauty, vigor and authority
= state in which deities, humans, or animals have personal greatness and a high status, recognized and respected by others
= state in which deities, humans, or animals have personal greatness and a high status, recognized and respected by others
= action by which humans complete a task with the expected or desired outcome
= action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a donkey (חֲמֹור) or a horse (סוּס) or in a chariot (מֶרְכָּבָה)
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire knowledge, a skill, or a certain type of behavior
= state in which humans, deities, places and activities have qualities that inspire fear in others
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun

= pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are killed or severely wounded by enemies

= the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
the throne representing someone's position as monarch or judge
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= an adverb that specifies unending time
literally: staff; hence: = state of authority over someone else symbolized by a scepter
literally: smoothness; hence: = state in which an event is morally and ethically right
literally: staff; hence: = state of authority over someone else symbolized by a scepter
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice
= causative action by which someone in authority confers the office of priest, king, or prophet on another person, by pouring oil on that person's head
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
= person that belongs to a group or class of people

= the gum of a bush or shrub with thick thorny branches that project and bend at odd angles; its leaves come in sets of three; its fruit is oval like a plum; its wood and bark have a pleasant smell; the gum oozes naturally from the branches; clear or yellowish brown when it comes out, but gets darker as it dries; ◄ Commiphora myrrha, abyssinica, or schimperi; ► an ingredient of anointing oil and perfume; ≈ regarded as precious
= chips of fragrant wood, from the aloe tree (agarwood)

= product of a tree found in India and Sri Lanka; ◄ Cinnamomum cassia cassia tree; ► its bark is used as spice and for the preparation of perfume and anointing oil; the buds are used to flavor and season food; its leaves and pods may have medicinal qualities
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= a hard creamy white substance ◄ made from the tusk of elephants ► and often used to make ornaments and other articles; ≈ regarded as valuable
= causative action where human or deities cause (other) humans to feel and show great joy
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
literally: precious; hence: = state in which humans are considered valuable and worthy of respect
= state in which humans, deities or animals place themselves in a certain location in an upright position
= wife of a king
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= poetic term for gold (זָהָב)
= region; ◄ probably in southern Arabia; ► known for its gold
= title used to address a woman who is regarded with some degree of affection, ◄ as if she were the speaker's child

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: to bend (one's) ear; hence: = action by which humans or deities make a conscious effort to listen to what (other) humans say
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group
= to experience a desire to see something happen or to do something oneself; ◄ this desire is associated with one's נֶפֶשׁ (נֶפֶשׁ) ≈ and can be both good and evil
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which the outward appearance of humans or objects is pleasing to the eye
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= town; ◄ on the Phoenician coast; ► famous as sea port

= objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient
literally: to weaken someone's face; hence: = causative action by which humans make an effort to make (other) humans or deities willing to act in their favor
= objects of value in someone's possession
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= cloth with decorative patterns sewn into it by hand and therefore expensive; ≈ regarded as beautiful and valuable
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or inanimate objects to move or be moved from one place to another
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= young unmarried woman, who has never been married before, and has never had sex with a man
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= someone who has kind regard for and is in friendly relationship with another person
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or inanimate objects to move or be moved from one place to another
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= indirect male progenitor
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to place (in a position)|to make|to appoint
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities give (other) humans a certain task or responsibility
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= causative action by which humans or deities cause information that is stored in someone else's mind to be reprocessed by speaking about it
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= an adverb that specifies unending time
